010package More_;
011
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.CssColorSequencer;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptor;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptorUniform;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
025import imagingbook.common.math.Complex;
026import imagingbook.common.regions.Contour;
027import imagingbook.common.regions.ContourTracer;
028import imagingbook.common.regions.RegionContourSegmentation;
029import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
030
031import java.awt.Color;
032import java.awt.Font;
033import java.awt.Shape;
034import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
035import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Locale;
038
039import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
040
041/**
042 * <p>
043 * This ImageJ plugin visualizes the composition of 2D shapes by superposition of nested ellipses, corresponding to
044 * complex coefficient pairs of elliptic Fourier descriptors.
045 * </p>
046 * <p>
047 * The plugin assumes that the input image is binary (of type {@link ByteProcessor}). It is segmented and the outer
048 * contour of the largest connected component is used to calculate a Fourier descriptor (of type
049 * {@link FourierDescriptorUniform}) with a user-defined number of coefficient pairs. The plugin then displays a
050 * sequence of frames illustrating the reconstruction of the shape by superposition of nested ellipses as the path
051 * parameter (t) runs from 0 to 1. See Sec. 26.3.6 (esp. Fig. 26.12) of [1] for details.
052 * </p>
053 * <p>
054 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction Using Java</em>, 2nd ed,
055 * Springer (2016).
056 * </p>
057 *
058 * @author WB
059 * @version 2022/10/28
060 */
061public class Fourier_Descriptor_Animation implements PlugInFilter {
062        // TODO: add key event to stop animation
063        private static int FourierCoefficientPairs = 3;
064        
065        // visualization-related settings
066        private static int StepsPerFullRevolution = 500;
067        private static int StepsPerSecond = 10;
068        
069        private static boolean ShowOriginalContour = true;
070        private static boolean ShowFullReconstruction = true;
071        private static boolean ShowEllipseTree = true;
072        private static boolean ShowPathParameter = true;
073        
074        private static int ReconstructionPoints = 100;
075        
076        private static Color ContourColor = new Color(0, 60, 255);
077        private static double ContourStrokeWidth = 0.25;
078        private static double ReconstructionMarkerRadius = 3.0;
079        private static Color ReconstructionColor = new Color(0, 185, 15);
080        private static double ReconstructionStrokeWidth = 0.5;
081        
082        private static Font PathParameterFont = new Font(Font.MONOSPACED, Font.PLAIN, 10);
083        
084        private ImagePlus im;
085        
086        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
087
088        /**
089         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
090         */
091        public Fourier_Descriptor_Animation() {
092                if (noCurrentImage()) {
093                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.MapleLeafSmall);
094                }
095        }
096        
097        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
098        
099        @Override
100        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
101        this.im = im;
102                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES; 
103        }
104        
105        @Override
106        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
107                
108                if (!runDialog()) {
109                        return;
110                }
111                
112                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) ip;
113                Pnt2d[] contr = getLargestRegionContour(bp);
114                FourierDescriptor fd = FourierDescriptorUniform.from(FourierDescriptor.toComplexArray(contr), FourierCoefficientPairs);
115                Complex ctr = fd.getCoefficient(0);
116                
117                ImagePlus imA = makeBackgroundImage();  
118                imA.show();
119                
120                ColoredStroke contourStroke = new ColoredStroke(ContourStrokeWidth, ContourColor);
121                ColoredStroke reconstructionStroke = new ColoredStroke(ReconstructionStrokeWidth, ReconstructionColor);
122                
123                long frameTimeMs = Math.round(1000.0/StepsPerSecond);
124                boolean done = false;
125
126                while (!done) {         
127                        for (int k = 0; k < StepsPerFullRevolution; k++) {              
128                                if (IJ.escapePressed() || imA.getWindow() == null || imA.getWindow().isClosed()) {
129                                        done = true; break;
130                                }
131                                
132                                double t = (double) k / StepsPerFullRevolution; // t in [0,1]
133                                long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
134                                
135                                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
136                                
137                                if (ShowPathParameter) {
138                                        ola.addText(5, 0, String.format(Locale.US, "t=%.4f", t), PathParameterFont, Color.black);
139                                }
140
141                                if (ShowOriginalContour) {
142                                        ola.addShape(toClosedPath(contr), contourStroke);
143                                        ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(ctr.re, ctr.im).getShape());
144                                }
145
146                                if (ShowFullReconstruction) { // draw the shape reconstructed from all FD-pairs
147                                        Path2D rec = FourierDescriptor.toPath(fd.getShapeFull(ReconstructionPoints));
148                                        ola.addShape(rec, reconstructionStroke);
149                                }
150
151                                if (ShowEllipseTree) {
152                                        Complex cc = ctr;       // current ellipse center
153                                        CssColorSequencer csq = new CssColorSequencer();
154                                        csq.setRandomSeed(17);
155                                        for (int m = 1; m <= FourierCoefficientPairs; m++) {
156                                                Color ellcol = csq.next();
157                                                ColoredStroke ellipseStroke = new ColoredStroke(ReconstructionStrokeWidth/2, ellcol);
158                                                
159                                                // draw the ellipse for FD pair m:
160                                                Shape ellipse = fd.getEllipse(m);                       
161                                                AffineTransform trans = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(cc.re, cc.im);
162                                                Shape shape = trans.createTransformedShape(ellipse);
163                                                ola.addShape(shape, ellipseStroke);
164
165                                                // show marker for current path position for t
166                                                Complex cNext = cc.add(fd.getShapePointPair(m, t));
167                                                ellipseStroke.setFillColor(ellcol);
168                                                ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(cNext.toArray()).getShape(ReconstructionMarkerRadius), ellipseStroke);
169                                                
170                                                // make current point the center of the next ellipse
171                                                cc = cc.add(cNext);
172                                                cc = cNext;
173                                        }
174                                }
175
176                                imA.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
177                                imA.updateAndDraw();
178                                
179                                // check and wait if needed:
180                                long elapsedTime = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
181                                int remainingTime = (int) (frameTimeMs - elapsedTime);
182                                if (remainingTime > 0) {
183                                        IJ.wait(remainingTime);
184                                }
185                        }
186                }
187        }
188
189        private void brighten(ByteProcessor ip, int minGray) {
190                 float scale = (255 - minGray) / 255f;
191                 int[] table = new int[256];
192                 for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
193                         table[i] = Math.round(minGray + scale * i);
194                         
195                 }
196                 ip.applyTable(table);
197        }
198
199        // -------------------------------------------------------------
200        
201        private Pnt2d[]  getLargestRegionContour(ByteProcessor ip) {
202                //  label regions and trace contours
203                ContourTracer tracer = new RegionContourSegmentation(ip);
204                List<? extends Contour> outerContours = tracer.getOuterContours(true);
205                
206                if (outerContours.isEmpty()) {
207                        IJ.error("no regions found");
208                        return null;
209                }
210                
211                return outerContours.get(0).getPointArray();    // contour of largest region
212        }
213        
214        private ImagePlus makeBackgroundImage() {
215                ByteProcessor bp = im.getProcessor().convertToByteProcessor();
216                String title = String.format("%s-partial-%03d", im.getShortTitle(), FourierCoefficientPairs);
217                
218                if (bp.isInvertedLut()) {
219                        bp.invert();
220                        bp.invertLut();
221                }
222                brighten(bp, 220);      
223                return new ImagePlus(title, bp);
224        }
225        
226        private Path2D toClosedPath(Pnt2d[] pnts) {
227                Path2D path = new Path2D.Float();
228                path.moveTo(pnts[0].getX(), pnts[0].getY());
229                for (int i = 1; i < pnts.length; i++) {
230                        path.lineTo(pnts[i].getX(), pnts[i].getY());
231                }
232                path.closePath();
233                return path;
234        }
235        
236        // -------------------------------------------------------------
237        
238        private boolean runDialog() {
239                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
240                gd.addMessage("Fourier decomposition parameters:");
241                gd.addNumericField("Number of FD pairs (min. 1)", FourierCoefficientPairs, 0);
242                gd.addNumericField("Reconstruction Points", ReconstructionPoints, 0);
243                
244                gd.addMessage("Animation parameters:");
245                gd.addNumericField("Steps per full revolution", StepsPerFullRevolution, 0);
246                gd.addNumericField("Steps per second", StepsPerSecond, 0);
247                
248                gd.addCheckbox("Show Original Contour", ShowOriginalContour);
249                gd.addCheckbox("Show Full Reconstruction", ShowFullReconstruction);
250                gd.addCheckbox("Show Ellipse Tree", ShowEllipseTree);
251                gd.addCheckbox("Show Path Parameter (t)", ShowPathParameter);
252                
253                gd.showDialog();
254                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
255                        return false;
256                
257                FourierCoefficientPairs = Math.max(1, (int) gd.getNextNumber());
258                ReconstructionPoints = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
259                
260                StepsPerFullRevolution = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
261                StepsPerSecond = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
262                
263                ShowOriginalContour = gd.getNextBoolean();
264                ShowFullReconstruction = gd.getNextBoolean();
265                ShowEllipseTree = gd.getNextBoolean();
266                ShowPathParameter = gd.getNextBoolean();
267                
268                gd.addMessage("Press ESC or close window to stop animation.");
269                return true;
270        }
271        
272}
